description: Demolition of existing garages, in association with the construction of two, two storey residential dwellings with associated access and landscaping (Conservation Area Consent)
decision_conditions: The demolition shall begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this consent.   Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: 2-017-P01 Rev A, 12-017-PO2 Rev B,12-017-P03 Rev B, 12-017-P04 Rev A, 12-017-P05 Rev B, 12-017-P06 Rev A, 12-017-P07 Rev A, 12-017-P08 Rev A, 12-017-P09, 12-017-P10, 12-017-P11 and Q620-SK01unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.  Reason: In the interests of proper planning and to ensure that the development is implemented in accordance with the approved plans, which have been, assessed against the Ealing Development Plan. | No demolition, or alteration by way of substantial partial demolition, shall commence until arrangements have been put in place to secure the redevelopment of the site under planning permission ref PP/2013/1428 and these arrangements have been agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The arrangements shall include details of the time scale for carrying out the redevelopment.    Reason : To avoid preventative demolition that would be detrimental to the character and appearance of the conservation area, in pursuance of policy 7.8 of the adopted London Plan (2011), policy 4.8 of the adopted Unitary Development Plan (2004), policies 1.1 h), 1.2 g) of the adopted Ealing Development Strategy and policy 7C of the Draft Development Management DPD (2013).
